title: quests are broken :(
body:
Hey again Riot support! 

My worlds quests dont seem to be working, none of them are getting any progress, a quick fix would be appreciated as I want them cash money tokens.

Ty!

replies.body: In order to have matches count towards the World's Event Missions, you need to make sure you have the World's icon from the first mission equipped. Double check which icon you currently have selected!
